thread.title: Robert & Rebecca
thread.title_full: Nelson Alexander reviewed by Robert & Rebecca

author: Robert & Rebecca
title: Robert & Rebecca
text:
We were buying from interstate, so it was a challenge to view the properties we liked. Charlie enabled us to overcome these challenges. Throughout the period, he kept us in the loop with what was happening in the market and new listings and enabled us to see properties when we were in Melbourne.
Charlie was not only professional in his approach, he also listened to us. Significantly, he was the one who recommended that we look at the property that we bought â€“ we were initially a little reluctant.
His service throughout process was nothing short of excellent and we would have no hesitations looking to him when selling.
